structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Clerks, Attorneys And Other Officers Of Judicial Courts

law.catch_line: Assistant Chief Court Officers In Suffolk County
law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2012. For text effective July 1, 2012, see below.] The chief administrative justice may designate three of the court officers of the superior court to act as assistant chief court officers for attendance on the superior court in Suffolk county. Such officers, in addition to their regular duties as court officers, shall perform such other duties as from time to time may be prescribed by the chief administrative justice. Chapter 221: Assistant chief court officers in Suffolk county [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 93, Sec. 101 effective July 1, 2012. See 2011, 93, Sec. 137. For text effective until July 1, 2012, see above.] The court administrator may designate three of the court officers of the superior court to act as assistant chief court officers for attendance on the superior court in Suffolk county. Such officers, in addition to their regular duties as court officers, shall perform such other duties as from time to time may be prescribed by the court administrator.
